      garnet---Garnet is a remote cache-store from Microsoft Research that offers strong performance (throughput and latency), scalability, storage, recovery, cluster sharding, key migration, and replication features. Garnet can work with existing Redis clients.

      retina---eBPF distributed networking observability tool for Kubernetes

CISOfy /

      lynis---Lynis - Security auditing tool for Linux, macOS, and UNIX-based systems. Assists with compliance testing (HIPAA/ISO27001/PCI DSS) and system hardening. Agentless, and installation optional.

hpcaitech /

      ColossalAI---Making large AI models cheaper, faster and more accessible

dotnet-smartcomponents /

      smartcomponents---Experimental, end-to-end AI features for .NET apps

yesmore /

microsoft /

      generative-ai-for-beginners---18 Lessons, Get Started Building with Generative AI 🔗 https://microsoft.github.io/generative-ai-for-beginners/

luijait /

Stability-AI /

      generative-models---Generative Models by Stability AI

      firebase-ios-sdk---Firebase SDK for Apple App Development
